chapters.title: Prologue:  By Grace and Banners Fallen
chapters.info: Lord Estean Andiama, p. 21—Son of High Lord Torean of Tear. He used to play cards with Mat in Tear right after the Stone fell He now travels with the Band of the Red Hand, and commands its cavalry. He is one of few nobles whom Mat actually respects. He and some of his men are currently with Elayne at the Field of Merrilor.
